Headline: #34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at Michigan/112th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan & #19 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th & Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th, then resume their normal routes on Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
